response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss the details further. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
